name: Idle Soul RPG
description:
A Fun little Idle RPG Game about growing your stats while visiting pixel art zones with cool  enemies.

Be warned, this is a windows Executable that may throw Antivirus warnings, i am working on fixing this issue, sorry for any inconveniences.

Game is scheduled to be released on Steam as a Free To Play around April.

If you play the game in its current state, I consider you a playtester, so please leave feedback!
